title: Cog Of Destiny
opening: After receiving aid from Queen Hellene, Eliwood/Hector rushes to the sealed shrine. The secret road they follow is known only to the royal family… They pass Bern's soldiers unnoticed and unhindered. They approach the castle…

intro.speaker: Linus
intro.line: Wait for the opportunity, and bring them down... That's the way, right, Brother? And now the time has finally arrived.

intro.speaker: Black Fang
intro.line: Lord Linus, the enemy draws near.

intro.speaker: Linus
intro.line: At last! Everyone, scatter! This fight will be Lloyd's wake! Let none of them escape!

intro.speaker: Second Black Fang
intro.line: Sir!

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: I can see it... That's the Shrine of Seals.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: This is strange. We've made it so far without seeing a single soul.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: I'm afraid that's no longer the case.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: What!?

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: They're out for blood! Who could they be?

intro.speaker: Black Fang
intro.line: You're Lord Eliwood of House Pherae, correct?

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: ...And if I am?

intro.speaker: Black Fang
intro.line: We are the Fang, and we serve the Mad Dog, Linus. You will atone for your sins with blood!!

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: What!?

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: It's the The Black Fang... They're all Fangs. They're alive!

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: Wait!

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: What? What is it?

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: Their battle lust... It's not normal. Get too close, and they'll tear you apart!

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Why? Why do we have to fight? If we talk to them, they'll see.

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: We are no longer Fangs. No... We served Nergal. We were never Fangs. To them, we were never companions. Never.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: No... No... That's not true! That man mentioned Linus! Linus must be here! I need to talk to him! Linus will understand! I won't give up so easily!!

intro.speaker: Lloyd
intro.line: I've been waiting. And now, at last, the time to bring you down is here. The Fangs let none escape.

intro.speaker: Black Fang
intro.line: Lord Lloyd, the enemy draws near.

intro.speaker: Lloyd
intro.line: So they're finally here... Our opponents are strong. If anyone here is afraid to die, leave now.

intro.speaker: Black Fang
intro.line: For the Reed brothers' Fang must not fear dying.

intro.speaker: Second Black Fang
intro.line: We are all with you. Lord Lloyd! Do us the honor of leading us 'til the end!

intro.speaker: Lloyd
intro.line: I shall. In the name of the Fang, we will stop them though it cost our very lives. Go!

battle.speaker: Vaida
battle.line: Here they come again, those little Lycian nobles. I’d love to take them on, but… Prince Zephiel insists it was they who saved him… Pah… What’s this world coming to?

visit.speaker: Murdock
visit.line: Go. I saw nothing. I met with no one. Wait. Take this staff. Thank you…for Prince Zephiel.

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: You!

recruit-talk.speaker: Vaida
recruit-talk.line: So we meet again, boy. Are your little playmates doing well?

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: Take this!

recruit-talk.speaker: Vaida
recruit-talk.line: Whoa! Hold on. My, aren’t you quick to action... I like that. But I think you’ve got that axe pointed in the wrong direction.

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: What!?

recruit-talk.speaker: Vaida
recruit-talk.line: I’m not with the Black Fang. I serve only Bern. I’m here on my own personal agenda. Tell me, boy. Are you the one who stopped Prince Zephiel’s assassin?

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: How... Why do you ask?

recruit-talk.speaker: Vaida
recruit-talk.line: Hmph. So it’s true, is it? That settles it. From now on, I’m traveling with you.

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: Now, hold on...

recruit-talk.speaker: Vaida
recruit-talk.line: You saved Prince Zephiel. So, I owe you.

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: Why do you owe us anything?

recruit-talk.speaker: Vaida
recruit-talk.line: I told you. I serve Bern. Prince Zephiel is our future, our hope. You saved him when he needed saving, and now I will serve you.

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: You expect me to believe all that?

recruit-talk.speaker: Vaida
recruit-talk.line: You don’t trust me? My word?

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: Of course not!

recruit-talk.speaker: Vaida
recruit-talk.line: Yeah, I see your point. Wait for me then. The Black Fang and I are on opposite sides. I’ll prove it to you right now.

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: You!

recruit-talk.speaker: Vaida
recruit-talk.line: So we meet again, boy. Are your little playmates doing well?

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: You’re that wyvern rider... You’re working for the Black Fang, aren’t you?

recruit-talk.speaker: Vaida
recruit-talk.line: You’re wrong there. I serve only Bern. I’m here on my own personal agenda. Tell me, boy. Are you the one who stopped Prince Zephiel’s assassin?

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: ...What? How did you–

recruit-talk.speaker: Vaida
recruit-talk.line: Hmph. So it’s true, is it? That settles it. From now on, I’m traveling with you.

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: What are you...

recruit-talk.speaker: Vaida
recruit-talk.line: You saved Prince Zephiel. So, I owe you.

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: But why?

recruit-talk.speaker: Vaida
recruit-talk.line: I told you. I serve Bern. Prince Zephiel is our future, our hope. You saved him when he needed saving, and now I will serve you.

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: I see. I’ll take you at your word.

recruit-talk.speaker: Vaida
recruit-talk.line: Really... Then look for me. I’ll be joining you shortly.

boss.speaker: Lloyd
boss.line: It matters not who you are. It's too late... I will avenge my brother's death. One by one...

boss.speaker: Lloyd
boss.line: ......No more waiting, Linus. I'm...coming...

boss.speaker: Lloyd
boss.line: We meet at last, Eliwood.

boss.speaker: Eliwood
boss.line: Ah! Hold on! Let’s talk! We…

boss.speaker: Lloyd
boss.line: I’m Lloyd Reed, son of Brendan Reed. My brother, Linus, whom you killed, longs for you to join him…….Prepare to die.

boss.speaker: Eliwood
boss.line: Wait!!!

boss.speaker: Lloyd
boss.line: You there, who are you?

boss.speaker: Hector
boss.line: Marquess Ostia’s brother, Hector! And you, lout?

boss.speaker: Lloyd
boss.line: The Black Fang commander’s son, Lloyd Reed… You remind me of my brother. Something about you…

boss.speaker: Hector
boss.line: Huh? What are you talking about?

boss.speaker: Lloyd
boss.line: My brother, whom you killed. My brother, Linus….It’s none of your business……

boss.speaker: Hector
boss.line: I have a brother, too. If someone killed him, I would make sure his killer paid dearly and suffered long…

boss.speaker: Lloyd
boss.line: ……Well spoken. If you don’t want to give your brother cause to mourn, you’d best fight well…….Prepare yourself.

boss.speaker: Hector
boss.line: Ah!!

boss.speaker: Nino
boss.line: Lloyd!

boss.speaker: Lloyd
boss.line: Nino…

boss.speaker: Nino
boss.line: Listen to me, please. This is all a mistake…

boss.speaker: Lloyd
boss.line: Do not speak. We are enemies now… I can show you no mercy.

boss.speaker: Nino
boss.line: Lord Eliwood is not a bad man! You’ll fight knowing that?

boss.speaker: Lloyd
boss.line: They were Linus’s enemies… That is why I fight.

boss.speaker: Nino
boss.line: Lloyd, please…

boss.speaker: Lloyd
boss.line: Don’t cry, Nino. You must live for the future. I am bound to this course. Kill me, and don’t look back.

boss.speaker: Nino
boss.line: No! I don’t want to! Lloyd!!!

boss.speaker: Lloyd
boss.line: The “Angel of Death." Since the day I met you, I’ve always wondered… If we met in straight combat, who of us would win?

boss.speaker: Lloyd
boss.line: I think it’s time that question was answered.

boss.speaker: Legault
boss.line: Hey… Long time, no see.

boss.speaker: Lloyd
boss.line: The Hurricane… I heard you’d quit the Fang, but… Seeing you with them is…

boss.speaker: Legault
boss.line: Unexpected? Shouldn’t be. As soon as that skulking shadow Nergal showed up, I knew the Fang was as good as finished.

boss.speaker: Legault
boss.line: You know… You’re the one thing I can’t figure out. Lloyd, what are you doing here? Why this?

boss.speaker: Lloyd
boss.line: Who knows… But my brother’s dead. And at the hands of your newfound friends…

boss.speaker: Legault
boss.line: We’re not responsible for Linus’s death.

boss.speaker: Lloyd
boss.line: It does not matter. I believe you are, and that is enough.

boss.speaker: Legault
boss.line: ……All right. I see. Nothing’s going to change. I knew that, and yet… I had to try. It’s a bad habit of mine.

boss.speaker: Lloyd
boss.line: Farewell, Legault. My old friend.

boss.speaker: Legault
boss.line: I’ll see you again, Lloyd. With Linus…and Uhai… Even if it won’t be in this world.

end.speaker: Nino
end.line: ...Why? Why did it...have to...come to this...? I... I don't understand. ... ... ... ...

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: ...You were a strong man. Under different circumstances, I think we'd......

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: Do you regret the outcome of your actions?

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: ...Graybeard. He only wanted to avenge his brother. I can't... ...Maybe it's regret... I'll carry it with me forever. When I'm alone and dying, what will I be thinking of?

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: You're a powerful man. I doubt such power will let you live a life of peace. Yet you should not fear. For perhaps that is the path of your life.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: ...The path of my life...

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Lord Athos? When did you arrive?

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: Just now... I warped in, you know? I was watching you in my scrying crystal. The most important thing is that you've made it here.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: If that's true, why didn't you just magic us here in the first place?!

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: What would that have proven? You cannot hope to succeed if you cannot trust your own strength. Your own power must drive you. That is the most important thing. Now then, shall we go? Underground... Where Bramimond awaits.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Bramimond? One of the eight legends? Is that who you're talking about?

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: That's right. Of the eight legends, only Bramimond and myself remain. Your journey here was a bit of a test, I'm afraid. I had to see if you were worthy of wielding a legendary item.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Legendary...item?

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: That's right. It's a weapon that we, the eight legends, used to defeat the dragons. With it, you will be able to sever Nergal's power at its roots.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: A weapon to defeat Nergal...

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: The legendary items are sealed in lands across this continent. The only one capable of removing those seals is Bramimond. Now if only we will be granted this one request.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: It's so dark...

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: It's creepy... Can't see a thing.

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Shh! ...Someone's here.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: You're Bramimond...

end.speaker: Bramimond
end.line: ...Yes, I...suppose that is me. What do you want of me, you who live above ground?

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: We have a favor to ask. We seek something to help us defeat Nergal...

end.speaker: Bramimond
end.line: That is unfortunate, for I cannot grant that which you seek. Humanity would suffer were I to remove the seals.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: What do you mean!? The entire world is on the brink of destruction as it is!!

end.speaker: Bramimond
end.line: The entire world!? Why would I care about that!? The whole world can burn for all I care!!

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: By Father Sky... Your voice... The way you talk. It keeps changing. How many...

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: Bramimond has no self. He... She... It... Yes, it is a mirror that reflects the person addressing it. It projects no personality of its own. There are as many Bramimonds as there are people facing him. ...Bramimond, do you remember me?

end.speaker: Bramimond
end.line: ...Athos. Hmm, it's been many ages. I cannot fathom why you brought these people here. Why I sealed everything away... Do you forget why? The legendary items are not meant for human hands.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: But...we can't stop Nergal like this! We need your power to help us save the world!

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: Bramimond, remember... We, too, are human. These people, they will not be seduced by power. They came here without my aid, using their own abilities. You observed them, did you not?

end.speaker: Bramimond
end.line: ...It's true... They seem better, stronger than most humans. And yet, humans are frail. What guarantee do I have... that they will not succumb to that frailty, Athos?!

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: A guarantee? There is none. We simply ask that you believe in us.

end.speaker: Bramimond
end.line: ...... ...Once... There was a man much like you. His gaze never wandered. It was ever fixed straight ahead... ...... ...........

end.speaker: Bramimond
end.line: ...The seals have been released. You may now do as you please. I'm tired. You will let me rest.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Ah! It's good to breathe the outside air again!

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Bramimond is certainly a mysterious figure.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Mm... I wonder what convinced him to release the seals.

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: Interesting that... I believe it was darkness. A completely impenetrable darkness, the nature of which is beyond the comprehension of normal men. Regardless, you must hurry. The seals have been broken. Nergal has surely sensed this already... You must get to the blazing blade as soon as possible...
How unfortunate... You're too late.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Ah!

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Nergal!

end.speaker: Nergal
end.line: At last... At last, my power is restored. Come, Ninian, Nils. This way. Open the Dragon's Gate for me.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: You mustn't go! Neither of you!!

end.speaker: Nergal
end.line: Would you like to see my powers here and now? You may choose, Ninian. Obey me, or...

end.speaker: Ninian
end.line: ...If I go with you, will you let my brother go?

end.speaker: Nils
end.line: Ninian!?

end.speaker: Nergal
end.line: One of you should prove sufficient. ......As you wish.

end.speaker: Nils
end.line: No! Ninian! Why!?

end.speaker: Ninian
end.line: ...Look after Lord Eliwood...

end.speaker: Nils
end.line: Ninian!

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Ninian! You must not!

end.speaker: Nergal
end.line: The gate will open, and I will gain unlimited power.

end.speaker: Nils
end.line: Niniaaaaaaaan!!!

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Don't move! Nergal!!!

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: No! Get down! Both of you!!

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Are you awake, Eliwood?

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Where...

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Camp. You and Nils were both knocked unconscious by Nergal's parting gift. Do you remember?

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: His power... It's so much more than before.

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: If Lord Athos hadn't erected a barrier when he did... We would have lost both you and Nils......

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: If he'd truly wished to kill you, even my power could not have saved you.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Ninian... To protect us, she...

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: Even if you catch him, you can't defeat him. Not as you are. If you wish to save the girl Ninian... The power to topple Nergal lies within the sacred weapon. Do you understand, Eliwood?

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: ...Yes, I know what I must do.

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: You must go to Ostia and take possession of Roland's blade. But before you go... take this, Eliwood.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: This is... It's a...

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: That's right, it's a Heaven Seal.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: I'm sorry, Lord Athos. These seals... They do not find me worthy.

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: Trust me. Take it, and hold it in your hands.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Lord Athos!

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: Hm. As I thought. It finds you suitable.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: ...This is incredible. My body is overflowing with power.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Way to go, Eliwood!!

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Let's go. We have to get that weapon. We will defeat Nergal and rescue Ninian!!

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: To find the legendary item, you must travel westward. But before that... Hector, this is for you.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Huh? This is...

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: That’s right, it’s a Heaven seal.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Listen, Graybeard... I tried one of these earlier and... Well, nothing happened, OK?

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: Trust me. Take it, and hold it in your hands.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: No, I... Oh, all right... ...... ...... ...What’s happening...!?

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: What’s going on?! ...Incredible.

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: Hm. As I thought. It finds you suitable.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: It feels like there’s a beast running wild through me... ...What’s... What’s going to happen to me?

end.speaker: Athos
end.line: For a short while, the newly awakened power will run rampant. Yet this power is your right by birth. You’ll be able to harness it and use it shortly.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: ...Power running rampant... through...my body...

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Hector! Are you all right!? Your arms are trembling...

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: It’s true... I feel like I can overcome anything. Nothing can stop me. Come on, Eliwood! Let’s go get that weapon and tear that Nergal to pieces!!

end.speaker: Oswin
end.line: Regarding this particular issue, please convey to Lord Uther that consent has been given.

end.speaker: Soldier
end.line: Yes, sir!

end.speaker: Oswin
end.line: Lord Uther, your judgment... It’s too... ............

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Oswin! Where are you?

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Oswin! There you are. You just received a message from Ostia, didn’t you? What word from my brother?

end.speaker: Oswin
end.line: Nothing of any import... A simple...relaying of recent events is all.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Oswin? What is it? What’s happened? I’ve never seen you look like this before.

end.speaker: Oswin
end.line: Is that so? I must be more tired than I thought.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: If that’s all... Get some rest, will you?

end.speaker: Oswin
end.line: Yes. I thank you for your concern. ...By the way, did you finish speaking with Lord Athos?

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Yeah, we’re really moving toward something spectacular.

end.speaker: Oswin
end.line: Spectacular?

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: There are legendary items buried throughout the world. But we don’t have time to gather each one. We’ve settled on collecting a sword and an axe. The sword is for Eliwood or Lyn. I think the axe is to be mine.

end.speaker: Oswin
end.line: The legendary axe... The berserker Durban’s thunder axe, Armads?

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Impressive, Oswin. You’re so knowledgeable. To get this Armads, I’m going west with old Graybeard Athos.

end.speaker: Oswin
end.line: Just the two of you?

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Yeah, at first. Then I have to pass some sort of trial. Bramimond had to break the seal protecting the weapon, but now, if I’m to gain it, I have to pass a negotiation of strength, or something.

end.speaker: Oswin
end.line: ...I see. The weapon’s an axe, so you have to prove your strength.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: ...I will get it. That’s the only way we can defeat Nergal.

end.speaker: Oswin
end.line: I believe in you. I pray for your swift return.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: ......Oswin. I’m going to ask one last time. Look me in the eye when you answer. My brother... There’s nothing you need to tell me, is there?

end.speaker: Oswin
end.line: ......Nothing. The message... It said that there was nothing new with the marquess.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: I understand. I will believe that. The vow you swore to me in Laus... That’s still in effect, right?

end.speaker: Oswin
end.line: Yes, the service I vowed still holds true.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: ...Forgive me. When it comes to my brother, I...

end.speaker: Oswin
end.line: That is only natural.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: ...Oswin, this is for your ears alone. If something happens in Ostia. ...No matter what, I will return to my brother’s side. I’ve been irresponsible and foolish in the past, but... As the marquess’s brother, I will do anything required of me. ...So, while I’m away in the west, and anytime thereafter, if you have any worries concerning my brother... No matter how trivial they might seem, I want you to tell me. ...Please.

end.speaker: Oswin
end.line: I understand... ...I’ll do as you ask...

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Then I’d better get going. Take care of things.
